original_title: KAKSS Steel Dumbbell Set Of 2pc (Proudly Made In India) (10kg(5kg*2pc))
optimized_title: KAKSS Steel Dumbbells Set, 10kg Pair (2 x 5kg) Chrome Plated Round Gym Weights, Silver Black Dumbbell Set with Anti-Slip Rubber Foam Grip, Compact Hand Weights for Home Gym for women and men

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Steel Dumbbell Set Of 2pc (Proudly Made In India) 10kg (5kg x 2pc)
image_analysis.material: solid high grade steel with high quality chrome plating and rubber/foam anti-slip grip
key_features: Made from solid high grade steel
Rubber or foam covered handles for perfect, anti-slip grip
Ultra-compact size for more effective training
Perform a multitude of exercises: arm workouts, dumbbell sidebend, plank exercises
Material: chrome coating gives the weights a premium feel with an anti-slip texture
Handles designed not to bend or break after repeated use
Ideal weights for beginners and professionals
Suitable for use in gyms and homes
Helps build strength in shoulders, back, core, biceps, triceps and other muscle groups
Foam covered handles provide additional grip while exercising
Can be used by both men and women
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and fitness exercises such as arm workouts, sidebends, planks and general muscle building at home or in the gym.
image_analysis.target_audience: Men and women, from beginners to professional fitness enthusiasts, looking for compact steel dumbbells for home or gym workouts.
image_analysis.ai_description: Pair of KAKSS chrome-plated steel dumbbells with perfectly round, polished silver heads and black textured rubber or foam grips. Weight markings like “KAKSS 5 KG” are stamped on the ends. Shown in clean studio and gym settings, they appear compact, solid and premium.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid high grade steel, one-piece heads stay tight and stable for years
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap adjustable sets loosen, rattle and plates keep sliding during workouts

comparison_points.our_benefit: Chrome-plated round heads and compact size protect floors and store easily
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Bulky, uneven vinyl or cement dumbbells chip, crack and mark floors

comparison_points.our_benefit: Rubber/foam anti-slip grip with no unpleasant smell for comfortable sessions
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost rubber handles often smell bad, feel sticky and slip with sweat

comparison_points.our_benefit: Reinforced handles designed not to bend or break under repeated heavy use
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Thin metal handles on budget weights bend, wobble and feel unsafe over time
